entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Harry's behavior is reminiscent of. The text states 'to Gryffindor for sheer cheek!' indicating that Gryffindor values bravery and daring.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being reprimanded by Professor Slughorn for being late. He is also the one asking questions about Horcruxes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who did not wish him luck when leaving the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as another friend of Harry's who did not wish him luck when leaving the room.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a teacher at Hogwarts who is being asked questions by Harry. He seems to be hiding information about Horcruxes.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone that Harry reminds Professor Slughorn of when he asks his question.

entities.name: horcruxes
